snippet: The president would like to fill all the seats on the board so it can make decisions.
abstract: Pres Obama announces three nominations to National Labors Relations Board, completing package of five nominees that administration hopes Senate Republicans will approve; nominees are Democrat Mark Gaston Pearce and Republicans Harry I Johnson III and Philip A Miscimarra.
lead_paragraph: The president would like to fill all the seats on the board so it can make decisions.

headline.seo: Obama Nominates 3 for Labor Relations Board
headline.main: Obama Nominates 3 to Serve on Labor Relations Board
headline.print_headline: Obama Nominates 3 to Serve on Labor Relations Board
